name: Bouncy Flyer
description:
Tap to Flap,Gyro to Control,avoid spikes and collect gems,how insane that can be?

Well Play and Find out....

Features:

-Retro Pixel Art

-Fun and Addictive Game

-LeaderBoards to Compete with the world

-10 difficult achievements to unlock.
